about_the_game:
About this game


Feel the speed like never before! Sugar Rush is a fun and addictive game in which you run without ever stopping through a procedurally-generated environment. Open your eyes and perfect your reflexes to dodge the obstacles and build maximal speed. Reach never-seen-before heights, beat all the records, and become the best runner!

A nerve-wracking endless runner


Sugar Rush propels you into a fast-paced, frantic run where only the most skillful players will survive. Dodge the obstacles and build up speed until you become supersonic! Master the movements and learn to use the curves of the terrain to your advantage to gain speed. Dash your way through the environment to go even faster, and travel long distances safe from obstacles thanks to your glide.

Jump right into this dangerously fast endless runner!


Become a true master and rush your way through with astute movements to take advantage of the physics-based acceleration and propel yourself further than ever before !
Collect resources along the way to replenish your life gauge and fool death
Stay alive as long as possible to score the maximum amount of points

A deliciously colored… but hostile environment


Embody Violet, your new cheeky heroin, in its thrilling quest for adrenalin. Make your way through mountains, tree ans rocks that hinder your progression. Dive into a uniquely colored and surrealistic world of candies and sweets, in a refined cartoonish style. Will you survive the deadly meteorites and make it to the River?

name: Sugar Rush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 7/8/10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz ou plus rapide
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU compatible with DirectX® 9.0c, Shader Model 3.0 required, 256 Mo, NVIDIA Geforce 6800 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
